description: JSON Schema for Cisco AI Pods.
title: Cisco AI Pods

cisco_ai_pods.description:
This dictionary provides the required configuration settings for Cisco AI Pods.

Optional Fields are:
  * `aci`
  * `hyperfabric`
  * `intersight`
  * `nexus_dashboard`
  * `openshift_container_platform`
  * `pure_storage`
  * `vast`
cisco_ai_pods.title: Cisco AI Pods

cisco_ai_pods.dns_servers.description: List of DNS Servers.  Can be IPv4 or IPv6 addresses
cisco_ai_pods.dns_servers.title: DNS Servers

cisco_ai_pods.timezone.description:

ocp.description:
This dictionary defines the OpenShift Container Platform (OCP) deployment settings.

Optional Fields are:
  * `bare_metal`
  * `tasks`
  * `vmware`
ocp.title: OpenShift Container Platform (OCP) deployment settings

ocp.bare_metal.description:
This dictionary provides the required configuration settings for Cisco AI Pods - RedHat Openshift cluster deployment.

Required Fields are:`cluster_name`
  * `cluster_domain`
  * `cluster_network`
  * `cluster_version`
  * `dns_servers`
  * `iso_web_server`

Optional fields are:`cpu_architecture`
  * `dns_search_domains`
  * `iso`
  * `ntp_servers`
  * `proxy`
ocp.bare_metal.title: OpenShift Container Platform (OCP) - Bare Metal Provisioning

iso.description:
Default is `full`. Defines the ISO image type for the deployment.

Options are:
  * `full`
  * `minimal`
iso.title: ISO Image Type

ocp.cluster_name.description: OpenShift Cluster Name.  Can be up to 54 characters in length, contain lowercase alphanumeric characters, and may include hyphens.
ocp.cluster_name.title: OpenShift Cluster Name

ocp.cluster_networking.description:
This dictionary provides the required configuration settings for RedHat Openshift cluster network configuration.

Required Fields are:
  * `api`
  * `ingress`
  * `machine_network_gateway`

Optional fields are:
  * `container_network_type`
  * `container_network_version`
  * `routes`
  * `service_network`
ocp.cluster_networking.title: OpenShift Container Platform (OCP) - Networking

container_network_type.description: Default is `OVNKubernetes`. Defines the Container Network Interface (CNI) for the deployment.
container_network_type.title: Container Network Interface (CNI)

container_network_version.description: Default is `1.17.9`.  OpenShift Container Networking Intersight (CNI) Version.
container_network_version.title: OpenShift Container Networking Intersight (CNI) Version

ocp.cluster_networking.api.description:
This dictionary provides the required configuration settings for RedHat Openshift cluster API addressing.

Optional fields are:
  * `v4`
  * `v6`
ocp.cluster_networking.api.title: OpenShift Container Platform (OCP) - Networking - API

ocp.cluster_networking.cluster_network.description:
This dictionary provides the required configuration settings for RedHat Openshift cluster network addressing.  The cluster network refers to the interconnected system of logical and physical links that enable communication within a Kubernetes cluster, adhering to the Kubernetes networking model.

Optional fields are:
  * `v4_cidr`
  * `v4_host_prefix`
  * `v6_cidr`
  * `v6_host_prefix`
ocp.cluster_networking.cluster_network.title: OpenShift Container Platform (OCP) - Cluster Network

v4_cidr.description: OpenShift Cluster Network - IPv4 CIDR address.  Refers to the Pod Network CIDR, which is the IP address range from which individual Pods within the cluster are allocated IP addresses.
v4_cidr.title: OpenShift Cluster Network - IPv4 CIDR address

v4_host_prefix.description: OpenShift Cluster Network - IPv4 Host Prefix.  It defines the subnet prefix length assigned to each individual node within the cluster's overall network CIDR.
v4_host_prefix.title: OpenShift Cluster Network - IPv4 Host Prefix

v6_cidr.description: OpenShift Cluster Network - IPv6 CIDR address.  Refers to the Pod Network CIDR, which is the IP address range from which individual Pods within the cluster are allocated IP addresses.
v6_cidr.title: OpenShift Cluster Network - IPv6 CIDR address

v6_host_prefix.description: OpenShift Cluster Network - IPv6 Host Prefix.  It defines the subnet prefix length assigned to each individual node within the cluster's overall network CIDR.
v6_host_prefix.title: OpenShift Cluster Network - IPv6 Host Prefix

ocp.cluster_networking.ingress.description:
This dictionary provides the required configuration settings for RedHat Openshift cluster ingress addressing.

Optional fields are:
  * `v4`
  * `v6`
ocp.cluster_networking.ingress.title: OpenShift Container Platform (OCP) - Networking - Ingress

ocp.cluster_networking.machine_network_g.description:
This dictionary provides the required configuration settings for RedHat Openshift machine network gateway addressing.  A "k8s machine network" refers to the networking infrastructure within a Kubernetes cluster that allows all its components—including containers, pods, and nodes—to communicate with each other and with external services.

Optional fields are:
  * `v4_gateway`
  * `v6_gateway`
ocp.cluster_networking.machine_network_g.title: OpenShift Container Platform (OCP) - Machine Network Gateway

v4_gateway.description: OpenShift Machine Network Gateway - IPv4 Gateway/Prefix.  This is the frontend network for the cluster.  So we will define the gateway so that it isn't a requirement to also define the default route for the nodes.
v4_gateway.title: OpenShift Service Network - IPv4 Gateway address

v6_gateway.description: OpenShift Machine Network - IPv6 Gateway/Prefix.  This is the frontend network for the cluster.  So we will define the gateway so that it isn't a requirement to also define the default route for the nodes.
v6_gateway.title: OpenShift Machine Network - IPv6 Gateway address

ocp.cluster_networking.routes.description:
This dictionary provides the host routing configuration.  This is applied at the cluster level and will be assigned to the individual nodes.

Optional fields are:
  * `v4_gateway`
  * `v6_gateway`
ocp.cluster_networking.routes.title: OpenShift Container Platform (OCP) - Machine Network Gateway

v4_gateway.description: OpenShift Machine Network Gateway - IPv4 Gateway/Prefix.  This is the frontend network for the cluster.  So we will define the gateway so that it isn't a requirement to also define the default route for the nodes.
v4_gateway.title: OpenShift Service Network - IPv4 Gateway address

v6_gateway.description: OpenShift Machine Network - IPv6 Gateway/Prefix.  This is the frontend network for the cluster.  So we will define the gateway so that it isn't a requirement to also define the default route for the nodes.
v6_gateway.title: OpenShift Machine Network - IPv6 Gateway address

ocp.cluster_networking.service_network.description:
This dictionary provides the required configuration settings for RedHat Openshift service network addressing.   The "service network" refers to the system that enables communication between different parts of your application and exposes services both within and outside the cluster. It provides a stable and reliable way to access your applications, abstracting away the dynamic nature of individual Pods.

Optional fields are:
  * `v4_cidr`
  * `v6_cidr`
ocp.cluster_networking.service_network.title: OpenShift Container Platform (OCP) - Service Network

v4_cidr.description: OpenShift Service Network - IPv4 CIDR address.  The Kubernetes Service Network CIDR refers to a specific range of IP addresses, defined using Classless Inter-Domain Routing (CIDR) notation, that is reserved for the internal IP addresses of Kubernetes Services within a cluster.
v4_cidr.title: OpenShift Service Network - IPv4 CIDR address

v6_cidr.description: OpenShift Service Network - IPv6 CIDR address.  The Kubernetes Service Network CIDR refers to a specific range of IP addresses, defined using Classless Inter-Domain Routing (CIDR) notation, that is reserved for the internal IP addresses of Kubernetes Services within a cluster.
v6_cidr.title: OpenShift Service Network - IPv6 CIDR address

ocp.cpu_architecture.description:
Default is `x86_64`. Defines the CPU Architecture for the physical servers.

Options are:
  * `ppc64le`
  * `s390x`
  * `x86_64`
ocp.cpu_architecture.title: OpenShift CPU Architecture
